Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 52nd overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Charles Bodkin (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2015, off Gary Zoll (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2015, hitting .429 with 5 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2015, hitting .476 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2016, hitting .400 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Cincinnati on 4/16/2017 (Going to STL: P Robert Wilcoxson, CF Jesse Honeycutt. Going to CIN: RF Patricio Garza, P Jame Meany)...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 8/7/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2017, hitting .450 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Atlanta on 9/4/2018...
Sets a new season AL-Record for RBI with 128 on 10/2/2018...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 2/9/2019 to a 5-year deal worth $27,875,003 per year...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Cincinnati on 2/13/2021 (Going to CIN: RF Patricio Garza, 1B George Stebbins. Going to STL: P Imotoku Kyoden, P Zachary Pietrzak)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2021, hitting .333 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2021, hitting .474 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2022, hitting .333 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Traded from Cincinnati to Montreal on 2/4/2023 (Going to CIN: P Donnie Kopp, CF James Ostrowski, P Philip Lund, CF Hector Huerta, 1B Darrell Coleman. Going to MON: P Matthew Gordillo, RF Patricio
Garza, 1B Manuel Cambra, RF Troy Burrier)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2023, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2023, hitting .341 with 6 HR, 26 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/2/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/9/2025 to a 2-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Brooklyn on 8/15/2026...
Released by Montreal on 10/17/2026...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/5/2027 to a 1-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 8/16/2027...
